query:
query FeaturedTournamentQuery($associationKey: String, $curationKey: String) {
  cricket_featured_tournaments(
    association_key: $associationKey
    curation_key: $curationKey
  ) {
    tournaments {
      key
      name
      short_name
      countries {
        short_code
        code
        name
        official_name
        is_region
        __typename
      }
      start_date
      gender
      point_system
      competition {
        key
        code
        name
        __typename
      }
      association_key
      metric_group
      sport
      is_date_confirmed
      is_venue_confirmed
      last_scheduled_match_date
      formats
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}
